Chair the first challenge is that of fragmentation.  That there is not one single piece of legislation governing procurement in South Africa.  There is a report which I think Treasury brought out in 2015 that identified at least 80 pieces of legislatio n governing procurement. So I have indicated that there are various policieswhich should require us to take measures to advance historically disadvantaged individuals and promote social inclusion and economic inclusion.
